summary: The module implements the filtering framework used by Django’s admin site. It defines a hierarchy of filter classes that translate model field specifications into selectable options in the admin list view, construct the appropriate query parameters, and modify the queryset accordingly. Different subclasses handle generic fields, boolean fields, choice fields, date fields, and relationships, while a base class supplies common utilities and registration mechanisms.
business_intent: To give administrators an easy and extensible way to narrow down displayed records in the admin interface by applying field‑based criteria, improving data management and navigation.
